page.title: 12SCHOOLS IN ST. NINIANS.
page.content: There are 6 schools in our area altogether,one nursery,3 primary and two secondary.The{primary schools}are generally much smaller than the secondery. They are run by a Headmaster,an assistant and class teachers. Children of any faith may attend.{Secondery School}has more than one primary joining with it and the staff is much larger, Rector, Depute, Assistant as well as teachers. One of our secondary schools is attended only by children of the{Roman Catholic Faith. The other is {non-denominational.}You start nursery at 4 years of age, go on to primary at 5 and move up to secondary at 12. By law you must attend school until you are 16 but you may chose to go on until 18, then to University. We have a{special school}for handicapped children.(C.SIBBALD, R.SMITH)
